metadata.name: ULTRAZOOM #01
metadata.description:
This is the first NFT of this kind, a new way of creating infinite art through AI.

It is created by giving orders to DALL-E to fill in the blank space of an image after another, thus achieving an extension of the infinite space.

It is created through 11 images of 6144x6144px. The original artwork is 4K 60fps and adaptable to any type of format/resolution.
